name: The 8th Sin
description:
The 8th Sin is a 2D beat ‘em up, where the player must defeat enemies and commit sins in order to become stronger. Two demons must fight their way across the seven deadly lands of hell to become the 8th sin. 

Feature List:

- Local Co-op

- Unlockable Content

- Replay-ability

Website - https://holydaemon.wixsite.com/the8thsin
